title: 2 Days Experience in Paracas, Huacachina & Nazca Lines from Lima
description:
Day 1: Ballestas Islands & National Reserve of Paracas

Come with us to the beautiful Port of Paracas and be part of a wildlife adventure that will make you fall in love with nature. Observe the sea lions and the humbolt penguins during an exicting boat trip in the Ballestas Islands. After the boat trip, we visit the National Reserve of Paracas, which is the continuation of the Atacama desert. Enjoy Nature, breath pure air, without doubts, this experience will connect you to Pachamama, our mother earth.

We arrive to our hotel in Nazca to overnight.

Day 2: Flight to Nazca Lines & Visit to Huacachina Oasis

Get ready to Flight over Nazca Lines. As soon as the plane trakes off, you will enjoy the magic of the Peruvian desert. Observe the 13 figures discovered in Nazca and get the best adventure and view from the air. After lunch, we go on a thrilling adventure on the buggy ride! We will also have our sandboarding equipment to slide down from the highest dunes in Huacachina Oasis.
all_descriptions:
Day 1: Ballestas Islands & National Reserve of Paracas

Come with us to the beautiful Port of Paracas and be part of a wildlife adventure that will make you fall in love with nature. Observe the sea lions and the humbolt penguins during an exicting boat trip in the Ballestas Islands. After the boat trip, we visit the National Reserve of Paracas, which is the continuation of the Atacama desert. Enjoy Nature, breath pure air, without doubts, this experience will connect you to Pachamama, our mother earth.

We arrive to our hotel in Nazca to overnight.

Day 2: Flight to Nazca Lines & Visit to Huacachina Oasis

Get ready to Flight over Nazca Lines. As soon as the plane trakes off, you will enjoy the magic of the Peruvian desert. Observe the 13 figures discovered in Nazca and get the best adventure and view from the air. After lunch, we go on a thrilling adventure on the buggy ride! We will also have our sandboarding equipment to slide down from the highest dunes in Huacachina Oasis.

ItineraryThis is a typical itinerary for this productStop At:Islas Ballestas, Paracas 11660 PeruBoat trip to Ballestas IslandsDuration: 2 hoursStop At:Paracas National Reserve, Carr. Punta Pejerrey Peru3 hours tour in the Paracas desertDuration: 3 hoursStop At:Nasca Lines, Nazca PeruFlight over Nazca LinesDuration: 1 hourStop At:Huacachina, Huacachina, Ica RegionBuggy ride & SandboardDuration: 2 hours

Lindsey P
16 contributions

Fantastic Desert Tour

Aug 2025
We took this two day tour with Alex and Esterling and had a wonderful time. We would book with them again and recommend the experience. The sites were fantastic: the oasis was beautiful and the buggy ride and sand boarding was so fun. I get severe motion sickness and Dramamine did the trick here. Alex recommended so many delicious restaurants, and we had great meals thanks to him. He was very attentive and helpful, and we felt so taken care of. The Nazca lines were an incredible experience but my Dramamine didn‚Äôt work here but the ride is only about 30 minutes. We especially loved seeing the wildlife around Ballestas Islands and really enjoyed the tour of the Paracas National Reserve. But really Alex and Esterling made it such a great experience. They were so kind and friendly, proud of Peru and Peruvian culture, and made sure we had a great time. There is a lot of driving on this tour but in the morning you can sleep and you can also see a lot by driving around. Esterling was also a fantastic driver and so kind to us. We felt so taken care of and had a wonderful time!
Written August 13, 2025
This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

An unforgettable experience

There are no words to describe the impeccable 100 points out of 100 experience we had in Peru thanks to Peruvian Worldwide Tours. Beyond the magical places we knew, one as a tourist needs the experience and expertise to get to know him better. And they certainly have it
It's what we found from minute zero in Jean, Renzo, Alex and Sterling.
Renzo led us through Lima with his stories
With our guide Alex and escort Sterling we shared two days knowing magical places like Nazca, Huacachina (must see!!!!) Cahuachi and Ballestas Islands .
Hopefully you have the chance to meet this wonderful team of caring, polite, containerizing and fun people!
Total thanks üá¶üá∑ for the laughter and adventures and for addressing our concerns

George K
Miami, FL11 contributions

AN ULTIMATE BUCKET LIST EXPERIENCE

Sep 2023 ‚Ä¢ Solo
I just returned from ‚ÄúMysterious Nazca Lines & Huacachina Oasis - Exclusive and Unique Excursion.‚Äù It was a fabulous experience.

My guide, Gorki V., is the best: He is deeply knowledgeable and enthusiastic; his pride in Peru is infectious; he gave clear explanations of the complex history and significance of the sites; he made the itinerary run smoothly at the airport and at the oasis, places that can be a bit confusing for a first-time visitor. And he is a very decent human being who made the entire experience fun. Viator/Peruvian Worldview tours should clone Gorki and have him do all of their Peru tours.

The plane ride over the Nasca Lines exceeded expectations. It was a smooth flight (no one experienced air sickness) of about half an hour‚Äîplenty of time to see each of the petroglyphs. The pilots pointed out (in Spanish and English) exactly where to look and passed over each petroglyph twice so passengers on the right and left could each get a good view. My advice is to put your camera away and look out the windows the whole time and enjoy the spectacle. My photos were a waste because the contrast of the carved lines to the barren stone doesn‚Äôt show well in photos.

Do not fail to take full advantage of Huacachina Oasis! The dune buggy ride was crazy fun and the sand boarding even more exciting. Gorki took great videos of me sliding down ridiculously steep slopes.

Yes, there is no denying that the round trip (1000km!) drive from Lima is exhausting to do in one day, as some other clients have posted. Yeah, it‚Äôs an issue. But, IMHO, it‚Äôs a better (if imperfect) alternative than making this into a two day trip. The car was comfortable, and the driver, Ernesto, very professional. The trip gives a sense of the remarkable desert geography and a revealing glimpse into the challenging conditions of rural life outside cosmopolitan Lima.
Written September 18, 2023
This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.
Matt S
24 contributions

So much fun!

Sep 2023 ‚Ä¢ Couples
If you are visiting Lima, do not miss your chance at seeing the Nazca lines - they are incredible to see from the air. Seeing the geoglyphs makes this tour already worth the time - then add on the stop at Huacachina and this tour is a no-brainer! The dune buggy ride was so much fun! Highly recommend. Thanks to Mario for being an excellent tour guide and Juan was an incredible driver! Definitely book this tour!
Written September 6, 2023
This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

5 contributions

Great tour - Mario was a great guide

Jul 2023 ‚Ä¢ Family
Our family of five took this group tour without knowing much what to expect. Our guide Mario was fantastic in telling us about Incan and other Peruvian history and was a great host guiding us through the Nazca Lines air tour and Huacachina Oasis sand buggy and sand boarding adventures. It‚Äôs a time commitment to do this trip but if you‚Äôre in Peru, this is one of those things that afterwards you‚Äôll say ‚ÄúI‚Äôm glad I did that‚Äù.
Written July 15, 2023
This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Cameron R
10 contributions

This tour was the highlight of our trip in Peru!

We had an amazing day touring Huacachina and seeing the Nazca lines. Marcos was a great tour guide and Juan kept us safe while driving! We got picked up around 6 am and headed straight to the oasis. Marcos taught us a lot of interesting facts about Lima, Ica and Peru in general. We had the absolute best time ever on the sand dunes. We were smiling eat today ear. The Nazca lines were also great. The plane was a little crazy, since they fly in zig zags for both sides to see the lines. It was still incredible. This has been the highlight of our 2 months in South America. I would 1000% recommended this tour to anyone who is looking to explore Peru!
Written April 26, 2023
This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.
